activities: AddThis collects personal information online in connection with  business activities, including collecting information on customers, prospects, partners, vendors and suppliers. Oracle collects, transfers, and uses this information for a range of business purposes, including marketing and sales, provision of products and services, partner and supply chain management and legal and corporate enforcement and compliance. Oracle receives personal and non-personally identifiable information gathered online concerning consumer behavior and use of AddThis services available on publisher websites or through use of the AddThis toolbar. AddThis collects, transfers and uses this information for a range of purposes, including enabling interest-based advertising, analyzing advertising effectiveness, conducting related research and analytics. AddThis maintains a privacy policy for the personal information it collects in connection with its online business activities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Network Advertising Initiative, Digital Advertising Alliance, eDAA, IAB
recoursemech: The Better Business Bureaus (BBB) EU Safe Harbor program
